attributes.action: Do a more broad range of work experience
attributes.additional_details: As its a core passion of mine
attributes.background: Make a department team or funding to help start up a get into politics scheme

rejection.details: Petitions have to set out a clear ask for the UK Government or Parliament to do. While we can see that you'd like to improve opportunities for people who'd like to be involved in politics, it isn't clear exactly what you'd like the Government to fund or how you'd like it to approach this.
